features.name: Contact Form
features.description: A contact form that captures user details (Name, Email, Message) and saves them to the Supabase 'project_leads' table.

features.name: Visual Hero
features.description: An interactive hero section with 3D parallax effects, floating cards, and glassmorphism buttons.

features.name: Authentication
features.description: Handles user authentication (Sign In, Sign Up) using Clerk/Next.js middleware protection.

features.name: Booking System
features.description: Calendar and slot booking functionality for scheduling calls.

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Protected route for viewing submissions (requires authentication).
